sect2.title: Introduction to rep-gtk
sect2.para: The rep-gtk package contains a Lisp and GTK binding. This is useful for extending GTK and GDK libraries with Lisp. The rep-gtk-0.15 package contains the bindings to GTK and uses the same instructions. They can both can be installed, if needed.
